column2:
"Well done...
Is what I would say, if you weren't still so immature."
"Did you really choose the fastest and most reliable means to achieve your goals? Did you act without hesitation?"
"Conceal yourself. Disappear into the background. Strike from behind. Exploit weaknesses. Do not allow yourself compassion. And when your goal is in view... do not hesitate."

"If you are truly dedicated to becoming a 《Phantom》...
Engrave my words upon thy heart. The role of the shadow cannot be played by one who walks in the light."
